channel.title: Taiwan on Study In Taiwan
channel.description: Recent content in Taiwan on Study In Taiwan

item.title: Founder of StudyInTaiwan
item.description: Founder of StudyInTaiwan Welcome to StudyInTaiwan, founded by Pavan Kumar MP, your ultimate destination for navigating the higher education landscape in Taiwan. About Me I am Pavan Kumar MP, a final-year Ph.D. candidate in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at National Sun Yat-sen University, under the guidance of Professor Kun Chih (Jimmy) Chen. Currently, I am engaged in an enriching research internship at NCHC (國家高速網路與計算中心), Tainan, where I am fortunate to work under the mentorship of Dr.

item.title: Services for Students Pursuing Higher Studies in Taiwan
item.description: Services for Students Pursuing Higher Studies in Taiwan Are you considering pursuing your bachelor’s, master’s, or Ph.D. studies in Taiwan? We offer comprehensive services tailored to your needs and aimed at making your transition to Taiwanese universities seamless and efficient. STEP 1: Initial Consultation In this step, we provide you with valuable insights into the current conditions in Taiwan and assess your specific requirements. Through an audio/video call, we discuss your aspirations and concerns, offering personalized advice to kickstart your journey.
